DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , double-blind , randomize , control study safety effectiveness JUVÉDERM VOLBELLA® XC Injectable Gel versus Restylane-L® lip perioral enhancement .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Effectiveness Study JUVÉDERM VOLBELLA® XC Injectable Gel Lip Perioral Enhancement
DOC.criteria: 22 year age older Has score minimal , mild , moderate LFS2 , agree upon Treating Evaluating Investigators , desire least 1 point correction one lip For treatment perioral line , POLSS score severe moderate agree upon Treating Evaluating Investigators ( subject eligible treatment vermilion body , oral commissure , vermilion border , Cupid 's bow , philtral column ) Has lip tattoo , piercings , facial hair , scar would interfere visualization lip perioral area effectiveness assessment Has dentures device cover part upper palate , and/or severe malocclusion dentofacial maxillofacial deformity judge Treating Investigator Has undergone oral surgery ( e.g. , tooth extraction , orthodontia , implantation ) within 6 week enrollment plan undergo procedure study Has ever undergone facial plastic surgery receive permanent facial implant ( e.g. , polymethylmethacrylate , silicone , polytetrafluoroethylene ) anywhere face neck , plan implant product study Has undergone semipermanent dermal filler treatment ( e.g. , calcium hydroxylapatite , polyLlactic acid ) low face ( orbital rim ) within 24 month enrollment plan undergo treatment study Has undergone temporary dermal filler treatment ( e.g. , hyaluronic acid collagen ) low face ( orbital rim ) within 12 month enrollment plan undergo treatment study Has undergone mesotherapy cosmetic resurfacing ( laser , photomodulation , intense pulse light , radiofrequency , dermabrasion , chemical peel , ablative nonablative procedure ) anywhere face neck , Botulinum toxin injection low face ( orbital rim ) within 6 month enrollment plan undergo procedure study
